item.title: HPE 首席执行官发布旨在帮助企业的 "简单 "人工智能硬件
item.description: 惠普企业公司首席执行官安东尼奥-内里（Antonio Neri）在周二举行的拉斯维加斯会议上向有意部署各种形式人工智能的企业推介了一系列新的硬件、软件和服务。【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise CEO Antonio Neri pitched a new line of hardware, software and services to businesses interested in deploying various forms of artificial intelligence at its Las Vegas conference on Tuesday.】

item.title: 参议员称美国需要 "加强 "对中国科技活动的追踪
item.description: 参议院情报委员会主席周二表示，美国情报机构需要更好地追踪中国的先进技术和其他各领域的努力。【原文：The chair of the Senate Intelligence Committee said on Tuesday that U.S. intelligence agencies need to do a better job in tracking Chinese advanced technology and other efforts across a variety of fields.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，苹果暂停下一款高端耳机的研发工作，专注于廉价机型
item.description: 据 The Information 周二援引一家为 Vision Pro 生产关键部件的制造商的一名员工的话报道，苹果公司已经暂停了下一代高端 Vision 头戴式耳机的研发工作。【原文：Apple has suspended work on its next high-end Vision headset, the Information reported on Tuesday, citing an employee at a manufacturer that makes key components for the Vision Pro.】

item.title: 特斯拉必须面对车主声称其垄断汽车维修和零部件的诉讼
item.description: 一名美国法官表示，特斯拉车主可以提起集体诉讼，指控亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的电动汽车公司垄断维修和零部件市场，这为她去年 11 月驳回的诉讼注入了新的活力。【原文：A U.S. judge said Tesla vehicle owners can pursue a proposed class action accusing billionaire Elon Musk's electric car company of monopolizing markets for repairs and parts, breathing new life into a lawsuit she dismissed last November.】

item.title: 柯林斯称，在通胀依然高企的情况下，美联储的政策耐心是有道理的
item.description: 波士顿联储主席苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）周二告诫说，最近的通胀数据表明物价压力可能会再次退回到美国中央银行的目标，因此不要对这些数据掉以轻心。【原文：Boston Federal Reserve President Susan Collins on Tuesday cautioned against getting carried away with recent inflation data that suggested price pressures may again be retreating back to the U.S. central bank's goal.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官称，如果银行充分参与，数字欧元是 "非常好的 "计划
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）首席执行官安德烈亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）周二表示，如果银行仍然像现在这样是货币流通的核心，那么数字欧元计划对货币集团及其贷款人来说将是一件 "非常好 "的事情。【原文：Plans for a digital euro will be a "very good" thing for the currency bloc and its lenders if banks remain central to the flow of money as they are at present, UniCredit Chief Executive Andrea Orcel said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 菲斯科从特斯拉竞争对手到破产的历程
item.description: 菲斯科于周一晚些时候申请破产保护，成为继 Arrival 和 Lordstown Motors 之后，在特斯拉和中国汽车制造商主导的艰难市场中倒闭的最新一家电动汽车初创公司。【原文：Fisker filed for bankruptcy protection late on Monday, becoming the latest electric-vehicle startup to collapse after Arrival and Lordstown Motors in a tough market dominated by Tesla and Chinese automakers.】

item.title: 德国劳资协议会称福特计划在欧洲进一步裁员
item.description: 美国汽车制造商福特在德国的工人委员会负责人周二告诉路透社，福特计划在德国、西班牙和英国进一步裁员。【原文：Ford plans further job cuts in Germany, Spain and the U.K., the head of the worker's council for the US automaker in Germany told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: Verizon 利用 GenAI 提高客户忠诚度
item.description: 美国电信公司 Verizon 首席执行官汉斯-维斯特伯格（Hans Vestberg）周二表示，通过预测客户打电话的原因、为他们联系合适的座席人员并减少到店时间，Verizon 正在利用生成技术阻止 10 万客户在今年离开其服务。【原文：U.S. telecom company Verizon is using generative to stop 100,000 customers from leaving its service this year by predicting why a customer is calling, connecting them with a suitable agent and reducing store visit time, CEO Hans Vestberg said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，Trafigura拟对违反保密规定的员工回拨股份
item.description: 两位知情人士告诉路透社，大宗商品交易商 Trafigura 上周致函现任和前任员工，建议对违反保密规定和行为准则的员工进行股份回扣。【原文：Commodity trader Trafigura sent a letter last week to current and former employees proposing share clawbacks for breaches of confidentiality and its code of conduct, two sources with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 50 多家公司表示有兴趣开发智利锂项目
item.description: 智利财政部长马里奥-马塞尔（Mario Marcel）周二表示，已有 50 多家公司表达了在智利开发锂项目的兴趣，此前政府曾呼吁就一系列含有电池金属的盐滩提出建议。【原文：More than 50 companies have expressed interest in developing lithium projects in Chile, Finance Minister Mario Marcel said on Tuesday, after the government called for proposals for a range of salt flats containing the battery metal.】

item.title: 美国 5 月制造业生产激增
item.description: 5 月份美国工厂的生产增幅超过预期，收复了前两个月的全部跌幅，但在利率上升和商品需求疲软的情况下，这一势头不太可能持续。【原文：Production at U.S. factories increased more than expected in May, recouping all the declines in the prior two months, but the momentum is unlikely to be sustained amid higher interest rates and softening demand for goods.】

item.title: Snap 推出用于高级增强现实技术的人工智能工具
item.description: Snapchat 的所有者 Snap 公司周二推出了最新迭代的生成式人工智能技术，让用户在使用手机摄像头拍摄自己时能看到更逼真的特效，以求领先于社交媒体竞争对手。【原文：Snapchat owner Snap Inc on Tuesday launched its latest iteration of generative AI technology that will allow users to see more realistic special effects when they use phone cameras to film themselves, as it seeks to stay ahead of social media rivals.】

item.title: Decagon为人工智能驱动的客户服务融资3500万美元
item.description: Decagon 是一家销售人工智能驱动的客户支持解决方案的初创公司，该公司周二表示，它已筹集到 3500 万美元的 A 轮和种子资金。A 轮融资由 Accel 领投，Andreessen Horowitz 参投。【原文：Decagon, a startup that sells artificial intelligence-powered customer support solutions, said on Tuesday it had raised $35 million in Series A and seed funding. Accel led the series A round with participation from Andreessen Horowitz.】

item.title: 花旗在重要部门投资者日之前重申重视合规性
item.description: 花旗集团周二表示，将加倍努力，实现与监管报告相关的某些流程和数据的自动化，并致力于在近期投资于风险和控制环境。【原文：Citigroup said on Tuesday it will redouble its efforts to automate certain processes and data related to regulatory reporting, and is committed to investing in its risk and control environment in the near term.】

item.title: 美国公布提高清洁能源工资的补贴规则
item.description: 乔-拜登总统的政府周二公布了新的清洁能源补贴的最终规则，以努力使绿色产业的工作岗位和工资待遇与石油和天然气产业具有竞争力。【原文：President Joe Biden's administration on Tuesday unveiled final rules for new clean energy subsidies in an effort to make jobs and wages in green industries competitive with those in oil and gas.】

item.title: 美联储主席威廉姆斯：随着通胀压力缓解，预计利率将下调
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周二表示，随着时间的推移，利率将逐步下降，但他拒绝透露央行何时可以启动放松货币政策的进程。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said Tuesday interest rates will come down gradually over time but he declined to say when the central bank can kick off the process of easing monetary policy.】

item.title: 美国 5 月零售销售不及预期
item.description: 由于汽油和机动车价格下降影响了加油站和汽车经销商的收入，美国 5 月份零售销售额增幅低于预期。【原文：U.S. retail sales increased less than expected in May in May as lower prices for gasoline and motor vehicles weighed on receipts at service stations and auto dealerships.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司首席执行官称，巴西航空工业公司是航空公司更快增加运力的 "绝佳解决方案
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）首席执行官弗朗西斯科-戈梅斯-内托（Francisco Gomes Neto）周二表示，在 "大型 "窄体飞机交付受限的情况下，巴西航空工业公司认为自己是航空公司更快增加运力的 "绝佳解决方案"。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer sees itself as a "great solution" for carriers to add capacity more quickly amid constraints to 'big' narrowbody deliveries in the industry, Chief Executive Francisco Gomes Neto said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 洞察力：农民的经济痛苦从堪萨斯麦田蔓延到大街小巷
item.description: 在一个被数英里波光粼粼的麦田环绕的小镇上，布雷迪-皮特森（Brady Peterson）的餐馆在周六午餐高峰期几乎空无一人。通常情况下，皮特的餐馆里会坐满点炸鸡和芝士汉堡的农民，但随着农业收入的减少，皮特森的生意也日渐萧条。【原文：In a tiny town surrounded by miles of rippling wheat fields, Brady Peterson's restaurant sits nearly empty during what should be a Saturday lunch rush. Normally, Pete's would be filled with farmers ordering fried chicken and cheeseburgers, but as farm income thins, so does Peterson's business.】

item.title: 亚马逊工会投票批准加入团队工会
item.description: 根据周二的一份联合声明，亚马逊工会成员已投票决定加入国际卡车司机兄弟会（International Brotherhood of Teamsters），这是电商巨头工会化进程加快的最新迹象。【原文：Amazon Labor Union members have voted to affiliate with the International Brotherhood of Teamsters, according to a joint statement on Tuesday, the latest sign that unionization efforts were picking up at the e-commerce giant.】

item.title: 贝恩：全球奢侈品销售停滞不前，中国富豪摒弃华而不实的奢侈品
item.description: 据贝恩咨询公司周二发布的一份报告称，中国最富有的人正在避免炫耀他们的财富，而是选择更加谨慎的时尚。【原文：China's richest people are avoiding flaunting their wealth in favour of more discreet fashion, according to a report published on Tuesday by Bain consultancy that predicted the weakest global luxury market since the height of the pandemic.】

item.title: 零售销售数据公布前，标普 500 指数和纳斯达克指数期货徘徊在纪录高点附近
item.description: 周二，在零售销售数据和多位美联储官员发表评论之前，美国股指期货持稳，跟踪标普500指数和纳斯达克指数的股指期货在纪录高点附近徘徊。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were steady on Tuesday, with those tracking the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq hovering around record highs, ahead of retail sales data and commentary from a number of Federal Reserve officials.】

item.title: 拜尔斯道夫：在不断萎缩的中国奢侈护肤品市场中赢得份额
item.description: 德国护肤品公司拜尔斯道夫（Beiersdorf）周二表示，第二季度中国奢侈护肤品市场继续 "强劲下滑"，但集团旗下的La Prairie品牌已成功获得更多市场份额。【原文：German skin care company Beiersdorf said on Tuesday the luxury skin care market in China has continued to "decline strongly" during the second quarter, but the group has managed to gain more market share with its La Prairie brand.】

item.title: 亚马逊药房向医疗保险患者提供每月 5 美元的订购服务
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）的药房部门周二表示，它正在将其包月服务（涵盖一系列非专利药品）的适用范围扩大到政府支持的医疗保险计划的参保者。【原文：Amazon.com's pharmacy unit said on Tuesday it is expanding eligibility for its monthly subscription service, which covers a range of generic drugs, to those enrolled in government-backed Medicare insurance plans.】

item.title: 早间竞价：零售业受到关注，欧洲局势趋于稳定，股市再创新高
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官将面临参议院的严厉质询和新的举报人指控
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官戴夫-卡尔霍恩（Dave Calhoun）周二将面对美国参议员就该公司的安全文化以及一名新举报员工的指控提出的严厉质询。【原文：Boeing CEO Dave Calhoun will face tough questions from U.S. senators on Tuesday over the planemaker's safety culture as well claims from a new whistleblower employee.】

item.title: 对冲基金与贷款人的交易表明危机时期结构的回归
item.description: 今年早些时候，一家对冲基金安排了两笔价值 6.42 亿美元的交易，这是自 2008 年危机以来从未有过的。该基金向两家美国贷款机构出售贷款组合损失保险，然后将大部分风险出售给投资者。【原文：Earlier this year a hedge fund structured two trades worth $642 million, the kinds of which have not been seen since the 2008 crisis. It sold insurance to two U.S. lenders against losses on a loan portfolio, and then sold much of that risk to investors.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，日立计划出售江森自控空调合资公司 40% 的股份
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，日本日立公司正在考虑出售其在与江森自控国际有限公司（Johnson Controls International Plc）的合资空调企业中持有的 40% 股份。【原文：Japan's Hitachi is considering selling its 40% stake in an air-conditioning joint venture with Johnson Controls International Plc , Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国证券监管机构誓言对非法活动采取 "零容忍 "态度
item.description: 中国证券监管机构周二誓言，将对资本市场的非法活动采取 "零容忍 "态度，并将所有金融活动纳入监管范围。【原文：China securities regulator vowed on Tuesday it will maintain a "zero-tolerance" stance on illegal activities in the capital markets and will include all financial activities in regulation.】
